content.rendered:
We all want a chance at a better life. Thank you for your support for Code the Dream, and for making those chances possible for others. Consider giving recurring monthly donations to provide ongoing support.

$
Select Payment Method
Personal Info

Credit Card Info
This is a secure SSL encrypted payment.
Billing Details

Donation Total: $250.00 One Time

{amount} donation plus {fee_amount} to help cover fees.

MORE WAYS TO DONATE:

Please mail donation checks to:
Code the Dream 201 W Main St, Suite 100, PMB003
Durham, NC 27701

Donate Stock to Code the Dream

Code the Dream is a 501(c)(3) non-profit organization. Contributions to Code the Dream are tax-deductible to the extent permitted by law. Code the Dream’s tax identification number is 26-3275886. (Note: Code the Dream was formerly a program of Uniting NC.)
